definition: an indigenous language that contributes features to the language of an invading people who impose their language on the indigenous population
details:
noun
- an indigenous language that contributes features to the language of an invading people who impose their language on the indigenous population
= example: an indigenous language that contributes features to the language of an invading people who impose their language on the indigenous population
= synonyms: substratum
- any stratum or layer lying underneath another
= synonyms: substratum
- a surface on which an organism grows or is attached
= example: a surface on which an organism grows or is attached
= synonyms: substratum
- the substance that is acted upon by an enzyme or ferment
